HomeComponent.description: Hi, I'm Esdras — a Full Stack Developer crafting end-to-end solutions that bridge design, performance, and user experience. From backend API's to pixel-perfect frontend interfaces, I transform complex challenges into seamless digital experiences.

About.description: I'm proficient in a range of modern technologies that empower me to build highly functional solutions. These are some of my main technologies.

Footer.like: Like what you see? Reach out

Metadata.title: Nova Horizonte | Esdras Portfolio
Metadata.description: Nova Horizonte is a project focused on civil construction and engineering services, allowing clients to request quotes directly through the website. The project prioritizes an intuitive, responsive, and modern interface, ensuring the best user experience.
Metadata.keywords: civil construction, projects, skills, construction, engineering
Metadata.creator: Esdras

NovaHorizonte.title: A MODERN CIVIL CONSTRUCTION WEBSITE
NovaHorizonte.description: Nova Horizonte is a project focused on civil construction and engineering services, allowing clients to request quotes directly through the website. The project prioritizes an intuitive, responsive, and modern interface, ensuring the best user experience.

Metadata.title: Phantom Code | Esdras Portfolio
Metadata.description: A cross-platform desktop app that turns screenshots into solved code problems — instantly. Built for developers, students, and anyone who wants to speed through coding interview questions with the power of AI.
Metadata.keywords: ai coding, screenshot to solution, electron, invisible coding app
Metadata.creator: Esdras

PhantomCode.title: A cross-platform desktop app that turns screenshots into solved code problems
PhantomCode.description: Phantom Code is a desktop application developed with Electron and React that facilitates capturing code through screenshots and uses AI to extract and process this code, as well as generate solutions for programming problems.

Metadata.title: Tarevity | Esdras Portfolio
Metadata.description: Tarevity is a modern task management application built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, and Supabase. The application provides an intuitive and secure interface to help users organize their daily tasks with efficiency and style.
Metadata.creator: Esdras

Tarevity.title: a modern task management application
Tarevity.description: Tarevity is a modern task management application built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, and Supabase. The application provides an intuitive and secure interface to help users organize their daily tasks with efficiency and style.
